product_name: SkirtSports Lotta Breeze Capri Skirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Thanks to the winning combination of full coverage, moisture-wicking fabric and fun style, the SkirtSports Lotta Breeze Capri Skirt helps you get through your workouts in total comfort. Lightweight, stretchy polyester fabric wicks away moisture and dries quickly. Flattering skirt is built over fitted capri pants with flatlock seams for a comfortable, non-chafing fit. 2 under-skirt pockets on pants fit music player, phone, ID and other small essentials; concealed music port in waistband accommodates headphone cord routing. SkirtSports Lotta Breeze Capri skirt is 12.5 in. in front, 14 in. in back; capris feature an 18.5 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Thanks to the winning combination of full coverage, moisture-wicking fabric and fun style, the SkirtSports Lotta Breeze Capri Skirt helps you get through your workouts in total comfort.
